long_description: Featuring a thin, lightweight design that works with the tall seats of most recreational kayaks, the Linda PFD from Astral is tailored specifically for women. Women-specific design includes a short torso height, sculpted foam in chest and contoured foam around the torso. Durable polyethylene foam provides high flotation with weight savings. Nylon outer shell provides superior abrasion resistance and durability; mesh liner enhances breathability. 2 large pleated pockets conveniently store essentials, and quick-access lash tab offers quick access to a paddling knife or safety radio (not included). Dial in the fit using the adjustable webbing side straps and adjustable shoulder straps. Reflective highlights placed high on the Astral Linda PFD, both in front and behind, increase visibility when sitting low on the surface of the water.
short_description: Featuring a thin, lightweight design that works with the tall seats of most recreational kayaks, the Linda PFD from Astral is tailored specifically for women.
